name: .NET RealEstate
description: .NET RealEstate API - A web project built with .NET, Microservices(and DBs) MediatR/CQRS Pattern, EF Core, PostgreSQL, Redis. It can be used for listing, browsing and renting/selling properties. (WIP)

name: .NET Movie Manager
description: .NET-MovieManager - A full stack (MVC) web project built with .NET, EF Core and the TMDB API, using Razor Pages as FE

name: ML MovieRecommend
description: Predicting Movie Ratings by using Matrix Factorization. A full stack web project built with .NET, ML .NET and React

name: ArchAI
description: ArchAI - React / Express / StableDiffusion / ControlNet- generate architectural sketches and drawings (WIP)

name: FinAI
description: FinAI - React / Express / NodeLlamaCPP Financial App (get financial predictions based on a LLM) (WIP)

name: Vue D3 Floorplan App
description: Desk Reservation - Vue / Express / D3.js - floorplan / desk reservation system (WIP)

name: DockerCompose Visualizer
description: A react app which takes a dockercompose file as an input and generates a graph of the services and their metadata

name: habGIT
description: A react habit tracker app which uses a heatmap similar to the git activity tracker to visualize the user's habits. (WIP)

name: React Pathfinding Visualization
description: A react app which aims to visualize different pathfinding algorithms by using a grid and start/end nodes and walls

name: Web3 Tokenization
description: A react habit tracker app which uses a heatmap similar to the git activity tracker to visualize the user's habits. (WIP)

name: KeepersOfTheGate
description: Our team's entry for the company's internal hackathon event

name: React Hacker News
description: A react app which displays articles from hacker news, allows the user to search for topics/articles

name: React Pagination Github
description: A React SPA which showcases pagination in react by displaying github accounts from an API.

name: React Markdown Preview
description: A react app which has an input field for text/markdown and an output field where it is previewed in real time (effects/images included).

name: React MovieSearch SPA
description: A single page application built with react which allows the user to search for a movie/tv show by title using the OMDB API. (There is an app which returns a list of results and one which returns only the first result)

name: React Poker Trainer
description: (Still WIP) A simple react app which aims to help people wanting to get theoretical knowledge about poker hands.

name: RealEstate FE
description: AirBNB Clone FE for the .NET RealEstate API

name: JS D3.js Map Meteor Impacts
description: Two Javascript single page apps which map global meteor impacts from a JSON file to a 2D map/ globe using the D3.js data visualization library

name: JS Github User Search
description: A JS GitHub user search app which uses the Github user API (from a challenge on the site FrontendMentor).

name: .NET SignalR Demo
description: An ASP.NET project built with and showcasing SignalR functionality as a chat client/service.

name: Angular Tour Of Heroes
description: The demo from the angular docs.

name: Angular Wikipedia Reader
description: An Angular SPA which allows the user to search for and read a quick summary of wikipedia articles

name: C# API Examples
description: A showcase of different ASP.NET REST APIs.

name: C# CosmosDB Demo
description: A demo of CosmosDB functions and CRUD operations (based off a SoftUni seminar)

name: C# Data Structures
description: A collection of different implementations of common data structures.

name: C# DB EFCore Projects
description: A repository which contains many EF Core Projects - Database Schemas for different projects. Used for learning EF Core during the Softuni C# DB Advanced course.

name: C# Design Patterns
description: Project : Design Patterns Examples in C#

name: C# ElasticSearch Kibana
description: An ASP.NET Web API app which shows off Serilog and ElasticSearch usage. Also Kibana is configured and can be used to search through and query the logs.

name: C# Polly Retries
description: Polly is a .NET library that provides resilience and transient-fault handling capabilities. This demo implements Polly policies such as Retry and Timeout. It consists of 2 API apps which create requests and responses.

name: C# Unit Testing
description: A showcase of different projects which were used to learn more about testing. Autofac/Mock, Unit testing etc.

name: C# Web Server
description: C# Basic Web Server - An IIS-inspired web server designed to mimic ASP.NET Core MVC and IIS Express/Kestrel. The repo contains the Server itself and a couple of mvc projects using it.

name: Docker
description: A collection of docker compose files and tutorials/samples of docker usage. (Originally forked from TimCorey's getting started with Docker repo)

name: GraphQL Demo
description: Still a work in progress - a demo/playground used to learn more about querying and GraphQL in genral.
